bibl.title: Problems in the Nomenclature of the Personnel and the Question of Marines in the Roman Fleets.
bibl.note: Expanded version of a paper delivered at the XIIIth International Congress of Greek and Latin Epigraphy held in Oxford in 2007. - A. The survival of Greek terminology. - B. The terminology of the diplomas. - C. The evidence of the tombstones. - D. Were there marines in the classes? - E. The role of Vespasian. - Refers to documents from Roman Egypt.
bibl.seg: Saddington Denis, Problems in the Nomenclature of the Personnel and the Question of Marines in the Roman Fleets.

Expanded version of a paper delivered at the XIIIth International Congress of Greek and Latin Epigraphy held in Oxford in 2007. - A. The survival of Greek terminology. - B. The terminology of the diplomas. - C. The evidence of the tombstones. - D. Were there marines in the classes? - E. The role of Vespasian. - Refers to documents from Roman Egypt.
